00033 /**

00035  * @{
00036  */
00037 
00038 #define NEWTON_DEFAULT_MAX_ITERATIONS   100
00039 #define NEWTON_DEFAULT_TOLERANCE        1e-7
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * @brief Estrutura de dados para o Metodo de Newton-Rhapson
00043  */
00044 struct RootFindingNewtonRhapson
00045 {
00046     unsigned i;
00047     RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj;
00048     //RootFindingDoubleT xi;
00049     //RootFindingDoubleT fXi;
00050     unsigned maxIterations;
00051     RootFindingDoubleT tolerance;
00052 
00053     /**
00054      * @brief Codigo de estado: nao acessar diretamente. Veja
00055      *  \ref RootFindingNewtonRhapsonGetStateCode e
00056      *  \ref RootFindingNewtonRhapsonGetStateMessage
00057      */
00058     enum
00059     {
00060         NEWTON_NOT_INIT = 0,
00061         NEWTON_INITIALIZED,
00062         //NEWTON_EXACT_ROOT_FOUND,
00063         NEWTON_MAX_ITERATIONS_LIMIT_REACHED,
00064         NEWTON_APPROXIMANTION_ROOT_FOUND,//,
00065         NEWTON_ERROR_FOUND
00066 //      NEWTON_ERROR_FDIFFX_POS_EQ_0
00067     } state;
00068 
00069     /**
00070      * @brief Codigo de erro: nao acessar diretamente. Veja
00071      *  \ref RootFindingNewtonRhapsonGetErrorCode e
00072      *  \ref RootFindingNewtonRhapsonGetErrorMessage
00073      */
00074     enum
00075     {
00076         NEWTON_NO_ERROR = 0,
00077         NEWTON_2NDIFF_TEST_ERROR,
00078         NEWTON_2NDIFFA_2NDIFFB_SIGN_NOT_EQUALS_ERROR,//,
00079         NEWTON_X_ISINF_OR_ISNAN_ERROR
00080 //      NEWTON_FDIFFX_POS_EQ_0
00081     } errorCode;
00082 };
00083 
00084 /**
00085  * @brief Apelido para struct RootFindingNewtonRhapson
00086  */
00087 typedef struct RootFindingNewtonRhapson RootFindingNewtonRhapsonT;
00088

00100  */
